input.sentences: for our community project we volunteered at the local park .
we planted some new bushes along the wall .
some youth helped to build a stone walkway .
while others trimmed the overgrown hedges .
we were able to make a real difference in this small town .
output.sentences: Home improvement with friends from church.
Everyone pitched in and worked throughout the day.
It was hot, but he still insisted on wearing his hoodie.
Proud of the teenagers who came out to clear the land.
